name: Mini Maya
imgAlt: Image depicts a cow OBJ manipulated at the joint near its head.
desc: Mesh editing tool that internally uses a half-edge data structure. Supports face triangulation, edge splitting, Catmull-Clark subdivision, and mesh skinning via a skeleton. Uses a vertex shader for mesh deformation.

name: 3D Rasterizer
imgAlt: Image depicts Mario rendered at 9x antialiasing with Blinn-Phong shading applied.
desc: 512x512 image renderer written in C++. Supports antialiasing up to 16x, importing .OBJ files, and Lambertian and Blinn-Phong shading. UI is built with Qt.

name: Scallop
imgAlt: Image depicts the project editor, with code and relations already filled in.
desc: Scallop is a neurosymbolic language for deep learning and LLMs. I'm currently helping to build a web platform to create, save, and publish custom Scallop user projects. Employs a Next.js frontend, Flask backend, and PlanetScale for storing data.

name: RCW
imgAlt: Image depicts a game round in session, with the timer running down and the player already having lost one life.
desc: Endless Unity minigame written in C#. UI was prototyped and exported from Figma. Color-based gameplay inspired by the Stroop effect. Playable from your browser!

name: sddm-theme-corners
imgAlt: Image depicts my customized login theme, featuring Hanako-kun and using an orange color scheme.
desc: Extremely customizable login theme for SDDM, a Linux session manager. Written in QML and uses Qt Quick. Has 60+ stars on GitHub if that counts for anything.

name: charl.sh
desc: How meta! This site was built with Astro, a little React, and Tailwind. Display font is Atkinson Hyperlegible, monospace is Maple Mono. Icons from Lucide.
